A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Impressive visuals\, but narratively incompetent. The creators of this film are clearly out of touch and lack the ability to write a story with any degree of cohesion or sensible characterization. Not only that\, the movie actively seeks to unravel the films that come before it in a poor attempt to \"subvert expectations\"\, but comes off pretentious\, tone deaf\, and outright unenjoyable. I will not be consuming modern Star Wars any longer until they prove to me that they are capable of making a decent film\, but I'm not holding my breath for that to happen any time soon.
